Description:
Use AI to scale deep content analysis both proactively and reactively with Microsoft Purview Data Security Investigations. Learn more about DSI and the robust Purview-Defender integrations, which bring the SOC and data security teams closer together.

Delivered in a silent stage breakout.

Chapters: 0:00 - Emerging Trends in Data Security and Workforce Challenges 00:03:56 - Introduction of AI-powered Data Security Investigations (DSI) 00:11:14 - Introduction to Embeddings and Intent Mapping 00:11:39 - Vector Search Example: Finding Similar Meanings like Cat and Dog 00:15:00 - Observability and Validation of AI-Detected Risks 00:22:25 - Introduction of Native Integration Between DSI and DSPM 00:29:50 - Applying AI-Suggested and Custom Categories for Risk Assessment 00:35:04 - Transition to Customer Segment and Introduction of Katarina 00:35:26 - Customer Story: Toyota Motor North America Featuring Dan Gorecki
Title: Enhance data security investigations with Microsoft Purview | BRK256
